name: 3 Little Words: Word Search Game
description:
Immerse yourself in 3 Little Words: Word Search puzzle - new visual word search game made to entertain you anywhere! Look at the picture and try to guess the three words related to it! Get started within seconds, the game is very easy and intuitive. Tap the photo to see the close-up of the picture and examine the image details. 3 Little Words: Word Search puzzle is for people who love word games like WordCollapse, crosswords, Sudoku, solitaire, word association and trivia games.

Features:
• Available in English, French and Russian.
• Over 200 levels - many hours of fun.
• Option to skip the words you cannot guess.

Exercise your brain and power of observation! The words we are looking for can be verbs, nouns (singular or plural), or adjectives. Try this new and very addicting free word search game! Fun for the whole family!
